results.title: Suzanne Somers, Star of ‘Three’s Company,’ Is Dead at 76

results.abstract: Quinn Mitchell, an aspiring journalist from New Hampshire, was escorted out of a G.O.P. candidate summit on Friday, though he was later allowed to return.
